title: Falcon Blade
summaries: The Falcon Blade is a pre-Hardmode broadsword that can be found in an Iron or Mythril Crate(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions). It has a very short range, yet high attack speed and decent knockback, which makes it useful until late pre-Hardmode. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, the Falcon Blade is capable of autoswing.

statistics.Use time: 20 (Very fast) (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 15 (Very fast) (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
statistics.Sell: 20 SC
